author: P V
text:
Tension prevailed after a 65-year-old Arundathiyar woman was killed by her neighbours in Periyar Memorial Samathuvapuram at Sundangipatty in Harur on Friday.

The victim, Radha, was raising flowers and vegetables in her compound.

According to police, Radha had a skirmish with her neighbour Sala (35), after the latter’s goats strayed into her garden.

On Friday, Sala, along with her husband Ganapathy and his mother Kandammal, allegedly beat up Radha, resulting in her death. Radha was found unconscious by her relatives. They took her to Dharmapuri government medical college hospital, where she was pronounced brought dead.

The relatives, led by VCK cadre, blocked traffic demanding that a case be registered under the SC/ST (Prevention of Atrocities) Act and that the family be provided compensation.

Superintendent of Police J. Loganathan said a case was registered under Section 302 of the IPC and Section 3 (2) (V) of SC/ST Act.

Sala and Kandammal were arrested and remanded to custody. “Earlier, the complaint was made against the two. Now, they have asked for Ganapathy also to be named. The complaint has been received. Compensation will be provided as per the Act,” Mr. Loganathan told The Hindu .
title: Aged Dalit woman beaten to death
